column5: Hi gang....I'm looking into possibly buying a cottage & I've seen a few on Dickey Lake that seem interesting.  The lake is in the Bancroft area.  Does anyone have any info on the lake they could provide me.  Thanks, Bill
Must be someone here with knowledge of the lake and area, anyone.
this link says "excellent" fishing....?  click here

Was kinda hoping for some first hand info.....but I guess nobody is familiar with the lake.  Also looking at cottages on Monck Lake...well actually anywhere in the Bancroft area.  Can't afford the bigger lake though like Baptiste or Paudash  Thanks

If your gonna buy on one of those smaller lakes up there make sure a large portion of it is designated for crown land. You could always keep your boat up there and trailer it to nearby lakes. I beleive Dickey is good for bass and laketrout.
